author: Shivani Tiwari
text: Life,should be lived as it comes, with no past projections, and future anxieties . Embrace it, one second at a time. https://t.co/f7oGQ4xY8X

author: Shivani Tiwari
Shivani Tiwari
text:
We cannot always trust the thoughts inside our heads .
After all , how do we know they are our own ?
